inclusion.criterion: Chronic Kidney Disease patients, who are receiving hemodialysis therapy for >3 months.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: of all ages and both gender and are able to give informed consent.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Have at least 14 teeth (excluding third molars) in oral cavity shall be included in study.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients have had periodontal therapy <1 year.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has Paget's Disease of Bone and is starting Bisphosphonate therapy. His sister had the same problems.
